title: Help Please!!
body:
When I went into a bot game since I got a Leaverbuster because my computer never loaded LoL, it loaded the loading screen than saw that everyone was connected and that I was the only one that had 0%. I waited for 10 minutes and it was still at 0%. I tried restarting LoL and stayed at 0%. I don't want to get any penalties for a error from my computer or LoL. Much help appreciated!

EDIT: Waiting until it loses connection works as it restarts the client.
EDIT 2: I just got lucky because it doesn't work still after I just finished the bot game.

replies.body:
Since you're loading percentage was stuck at 0% for over 10 minutes, there's a good chance that your network is having a hard time getting connected to the game server you're trying to play on. 

Let's be sure to hit all of our bases by doing the steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Be sure to test any of these changes in a custom game to avoid any penalties.
